Science publishing
metadata.title: [Advertisements for l'Histoire naturelle éclaircie dans une de ses parties principales, l'ornithologie]
metadata.creator: Ray, John, 1627-1705. Synopsis methodica avium. French
Salerne, Mr. (François), -1760, translator
Debure, Guillaume, 1734-1820, bookseller
metadata.physical-description: Item 11 sheet ;15 x 9 cm.;Item 21 sheet ;22 x 97 mm.
metadata.description: Two clippings advertising French translation by Mr. Salerne of John Ray's Synopsis methodica avium, published in 1767 by Guillaume Debure
The first advertisement is on sheet paged 537-538, probably detached from the 1767 volume of Avantcoureur, feuille hebdomadaire
The second advertisement, possibly detached from a catalog and trimmed, lists bookseller details: Chez Debure père, quai des Augustins, 1767. 1 vol. in-4°. 36 liv. rel
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
